==Steps==
# Destroy the [[Geograna|Geogranum]] and activate the Geo Lamp at the marked location on the right side.
# Destroy the [[Geograna|Geogranum]] and activate the Geo Lamp at the marked location on the left side.
# Use the wind current to ascend and glide to the marked location in the middle.
# Destroy the [[Geograna|Geogranum]] and activate the Geo Lamp there.
# [Optional] Go south across 3 floating platforms, then use the wind current to glide southwards to a small island with a '''Common Chest'''.
# Glide down to the platform, kill all the monsters, and destroy the Ancient Array Core, which periodically sends a pulse to deal {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
# After a cut scene, glide down (or fall and die), kill all the monsters, and destroy the Ancient Array Core on the 2nd floor.
# After a cut scene, you will fall into a pool of water on the 3rd floor.
# [Optional] Swim northeast towards a deactivated Ruin Guard to find a '''Common Chest'''.
# Go east to the marked location, and touch the stone wall once.
# [Optional] Go to the other side of the same stone wall and touch it twice to find a '''Common Chest'''. Return to the previous room.
# Touch the 2nd stone wall to the east 3 times.
# Touch the 3rd stone wall to the south 3 times to find a '''Common Chest'''. There are 2 stone walls to the south, but only the right wall is movable.
# Go to the 4th stone wall (the previously unmovable left wall) and touch it twice while facing east.
# Go eastward, kill all monsters, and destroy the Ancient Array Core.
# Follow the [[Seelie]] eastward to its court to get an '''Exquisite Chest'''.
# Go up the bridge to find the Sunset Vermillionite and a '''Precious Chest'''.

==Chests==
* Common Chest ×4
** On a small floating platform at the first challenge ×1
** Near the pool after falling ×1
** In the maze of movable rocks ×2
* Exquisite Chest ×1 between two [[Seelies]] in their courts
* Precious Chest ×1 after completing the domain
